meanings.definition: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with nuts and honey.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, I indulged in the delicious baklawas.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother bakes the best baklawas in town.
meanings.sent3: The baklawas disappeared from the plate in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The baklawas was a golden treasure of sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of baklawas filled the room, tempting everyone.

meanings.sent1: I baklawas the dessert with delight.
meanings.sent3: He baklawased the entire box of pastries in one sitting!
meanings.sent4: She baklawased the baklawas like it was her last meal.
meanings.sent5: Baklawasing the sweet treat brought a smile to her face.
